Workflow.Name: Kudos - Deactivate received Kudos when employee leaves the company
Workflow.Description: This flow cleans up previously created Kudos when the recipient leaves the company. It is triggered when an employee's user record is disabled or deleted.

LocalizedName.description: Kudos - Deactivate received Kudos when employee leaves the company

Description.description: This flow cleans up previously created Kudos when the recipient leaves the company. It is triggered when an employee's user record is disabled or deleted.
